pageContent: Background: This study sought to compare the effectiveness of aggressive versus nonaggressive treatment in reducing cancer-specific mortality for older men with early-stage prostate cancer across differing comorbid disease burdens at diagnosis.

metaData.source:
Duration of testosterone suppression and the risk of death from prostate cancer in men treated with radiation and 6 months of hormone therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18327816/
